What My Baby Eats I’m a firm believer in waiting until infants are 6 months old to start solids. Antiquated practices recommended starting as early as 4 months, and I still get clients that are told to put cereal in their 2 month olds bottles! Meatless

The importance of going meatless I believe in eating meat because of the basic food chain. Humans are at the top, and it makes sense that we consume those below us, just like many mammals on the planet. However, we know that meat is not necessary for survival, particularly in the amounts that the USA eats.... Read more
